doc.title: Soul Train

credit.actor: Grand Master Flash & The Furious Five
Sly the Slick and the Wicked, The

doc.plot: Since 1971, "Soul Train" has been the "American Bandstand" of the African-American community. Even today, "Soul Train" continues to be the showcase of urban artists and their chart-topping singles. The program also continues to be the place for beautiful dancers and their dance moves, though the dance and the dancers' attire are a bit more risque due to the changing times.
